description.value: To use it, spend 15 gp worth of wood pulp, leather, ink, and animal glue. Doing so takes a week of 8-hour days. On a successful DC 15 check, you can sell the finished book for 25gp, on a DC 20 one, you receive 50 gp instead, and on a DC 25 one, you receive 250 gp. The DC 20 and 25 books are suitable for use as spellbooks.
